title: PhotoMaker Pro v1.6.3 APK (Android)
description:
Create photos in seconds using PhotoMaker's huge effect library (growing by the day)!!
- Perfect for sharing on/ Instagram!
- Fantastic memes, photo frames, funny animated effects and photo filters!

Use the full power of the WatchMaker engine to design and share photo effects!

DESIGN & REMIX
The editing tools in Photo Maker allow you to remix & refresh existing effects or create your own unique creation from scratch. Features include:
â€¢ Optimized for/ Instagram - design square photos or a meme in seconds!
â€¢ 100s of customizable effects - adjust curves, gradients, vignettes, everything!
â€¢ Collages - Create your own custom collage frames and stickers!
â€¢ Animated GIFs - Add custom animations to your photo effect!
â€¢ 3d Gyroscope - Create an amazing parallax effect!
â€¢ Interactive Photos - Create hotspots to trigger actions!
â€¢ Animations - Create tap animations with 45 tweening functions!
â€¢ Cool Text Effects - Add glow, outline, even flat shadow!
â€¢ OpengGL Shaders - Powerful rendering for photo segments, radars
â€¢ Stickers - 100s of stickers to add to your photos!
â€¢ Stencils - Dynamic colored stencils to scale and resize
â€¢ Textures - Light leaks, film grain, holga, much more!
â€¢ Frames - Customizable frames
â€¢ Programmable Effects write anything you like using in-built Lua programming engine!

What's in this version : 
PhotoMaker 1.6.3
- More consistent color scheme
- Better scaling for tablets on some screens
- Fix for multiple effects downloading at once not completing
PhotoMaker 1.6.1
- Add text to your photos, change font, color and add text effects!
- 1-click to add photo memes!
Required Android O/S : 2.3 and up
